lore:
Before he worked for the Auditors as Twilight, Hexilo was a necromancer who terrorized an entire nation close to what is now known as Rodia. Thanks to his knowledge of magic and medicine, he found a way to alter and even control others through their blood.

Hemomancers are straightforward creatures of few words that are rarely influenced by other species.

If a Hemomancer Donor puts a certain amount of its blood into another creature's veins, it is able to control all its movements, overriding their will for as long as the substance remains in their system.
menagerieDialog: (You can tell by the cool and calculated look on its face that it's hatching a new, sinister scheme.)
There's no time to waste - let's go.
(It's pouring blood back and forth between two vials. Interesting hobby.)
(It stares at you in silence, refusing to say anything. How stubborn!)
What am I doing? The same thing I do every night, {PLAYERNAME}. Trying to take over the world!
name: Hemomancer Donor
